name: Ewe Woz 'Ere
overview: Ewe Woz 'Ere is our entry into the Reset64 Craptastic Commodore 64 4k Games Competition. This special edition comprises the original game, documentation and a custom loader on a d64 image ready to use in a Commodore 64 emulator or on actual hardware (including original C64, Ultimate 64, C64-mini and more). PAL and NTSC compatible. Baaary: mutton commando is a cyborg sheep from the future who must preserve the future of mutton-kind by defending the fields from an invasion of meanies. Armed with a plasma spitter, Baaary is dropped into a field to eliminate all of the meanies. Once all of the meanies in a field are eliminated, Baaary will be collected and moved to the next field that needs clearing. Some of the later fields may have been affected with stronger or weaker gravity. Be careful not to jump into orbit from fields with weak gravity.
